name: Belu
description: Belu is a Huge Giant characterized by its natural armor and formidable presence. It embodies strength with a robust physique and has a gentle demeanor, often using its power for healing and support.
memorable: Belu's ability to change shape allows it to adapt to various situations and assist others, making it a unique ally and protector.
goals: To assist and heal fellow creatures while ensuring the safety of the natural world.
relations: Belu may be related to other benevolent giants or creatures that inhabit forests or natural areas.
environment: Typically found in natural settings like forests or mountains.
strengths: Belu is resistant to poison damage and immune to being poisoned, enhancing its durability and supportive capabilities.
weaknesses: While Belu is strong, it lacks notable proficiency in perception and struggles to sense its surroundings effectively.
attacks: Belu can perform multiattacks with its massive Slam attacks, dealing significant bludgeoning damage and potentially pushing opponents away.
most_powerful_ability: Shatterstone, allowing Belu to hurl an enchanted rock that deals area damage, making it effective in ranged combat.
skills: Belu possesses average perception but lacks proficiency, making it less aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Belu can craft a healing poultice that heals allies and cures diseases.
It can cast various spells that manipulate plants and the environment at will.
Belu has a Charisma saving throw difficulty class of 14, allowing it to effectively use its spells.
spellcasting: Belu can cast spells at will, including ‘Entangle’, ‘Speak with Plants’, ‘Stone Shape’, and ‘Plant Growth’ twice per day.
